amendment.description: Amendment to the Canady substitute amendment (A001) sought to increase the threshold for payment of compensation from a 10 percent to a 30 percent loss in property value.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to raise the minimum threshold for payment of compensation under the bill from a 10% to 30% loss in property value.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Goss to the Canady amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goss amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 211 (Roll no. 192).
